reviews.review:
Half-Life 2: Episode Two is the final game in the Half-Life series until Valve remembers what it even is that they're supposed to be doing. As such, you might be hoping that it's really, really good as a result.

Well, THANK GOODNESS. It's actually worth the play. The worst part of Half-Life 2: Episode Two is when you have to play Episode One to bridge to it from HL2. Episode Two isn't perfect, but there's plenty of fun, and more than enough tension to go around.

It starts off with a good sudden WHAM moment, and then loses appeal for awhile as you crawl through endless caverns brimming with Antlions. Because after Episode 1, what players really craved was MORE Antlions. It gets better near the end of the caverns, when you find yourself being chased screaming from tunnel to tunnel by the Antlion Guardian. It's the beginning of a series of tense moments that this installment delivers so very, very well.

Over the course of the game, you'll do a fair share of driving, have a large-scale shootout from an abandoned inn, and blow up something around a dozen Striders (which can be a highlight or a detriment, depending on how you are at that section). There are some great sequences, some great plot, and you get the Antlions out of the way early on so you have the rest of the game open for fun! All of this in an episodic installment that's longer than a lot of full-price modern shooters.
Просто супер, но вот концовка... Честно, я такого не ожидал. Теперь понимаю, почему все ждут третий эпизод...

The second of the Half Life 2 Episodes Trilogy continues the story of Gordon's Adventure after escaping City 17, your in a train wreck wondering where Alyx is and how the Combine Tower Stands you'll see what is left is a huge magnificient portal.

Visually Episode Two starts in the outdoors unlike Half Life 2 and Episode One , its color palet has a cool feel to it unlike the darkness in Episode One.

The Game introuduces Dr. Mugnusson to the crew , the only new weapon is a type of bomb called Magnusson Device which is extremely effective versus against Striders and three new enemies which are the Grubs which isn't hostile it doesn't move provides light and health upon its death , the Antlion Workers which spit acid at the player but unlike regular Antlions are defensive and retreat when Gordon approaches them , finaly the Hunters which shoot bursts from their flechette cannon they also have a ranged charge attack.

The only problem was a voice bug which made npc silent and have no lip sync but can be easily by going into the game's properties > beta > steampipe.

Although there new features added, I still wish for more to explore in this Episode at 5 hours compared to Episode One's 3 hours, but hopefully we look forward for the new game in the Half Life's Series.
Can u make it through?

This is great.  You know - Episode Two - you get to shoot shit, drive shit, fly shit, and eat shit, but really - the really shitty thing is there is no Episode Three.   WTF!  Release that shit already!    Lazy ass bitches!  Cmon Valve!
This game is perfect for deaf and autistics. No voice audio and facial expresion animation!
Bloody awesome! Must-have!
Alyx gets stabbed.

Overall this was a lot better game than Episode One. It was a bit longer and has good achievements that make you play the whole game through at least twice. Unfortunately I suffered from a common bug: characters did not speak at all. Their mouths didn't move nor could I hear any talking. Luckily I could use subtitles. I hope they fix this some day because it really ruins the atmosphere. 
It is still very important to play all Half-Life games starting from the very first all the way to this in order to understand the story. Now I'm just waiting for the third.
I NEED MOAR.
ハーフライフ３はまだなのかぁーッ！

Continuing on the success and quality of the previous games, Episode Two brings new enemies into the story, accompanied by some of the most memorable scenes in gaming as well as a beautiful soundtrack. A must-play game in a must-play series.
Get it. Now. Amazing storyline, amazing gameplay, amazing everything. GET IT.

If Half-Life 2 is my vote for best-designed game of all time, its second expansion is my vote for greatest, most concentrated taste of that great design. When I say that the Half-Life games are my favorite example of the medium, Episode 2 illustrates why with a quick pace and fast wit. If you're impatient, play the original Half-Life and then this one; if you're willing to sit through a longer, and therefore more rewarding, experience, this series is an absolute must-play. That's my two cents.

Elmondom miért nem ajánlom! Az egész úgy indúl, hogy felkorbácsolja a kedélyeket, és érezhető, hogy a folytatás tenne pontot arra a felvezetésre ami ebben van. Nincs, folytatása, és ha lesz is több év múlva valamilyen csoda folytán akkor sem lesz már ugyan az mint volt. Már azért is mert aki a HL2 történet vezetésért felelős író kilépett a cégtől...
A vége sem valami jó, a benne történtek sem, tehát összességében egy depresszió futam, ha azt nézzük " sok hűhó semmiért".
Jobb nem játszani vele, mert csak fáj az ember szíve, hogy miért nincs folytatás...
Valve céget nem érdekelte a folytatás, őket a nagy pénz halom érdekelte, érdekli.
Nagy csalódás.
Ce jeu est super ( surtout pour les mod qu'il y'a , comme Nightmare house 2 ) :D
Второй эпизод куда лучше, чем первый)) Правда начало тоже унылое, но потом норм))

2007 год в лоб уже лезут, и устаревший графон с физикой, и тупорылый АI врагов.Игра просто кричит:"я устала вас развлекать!".
Ну да-да здесь есть крутая тачка, графонистые личинки львоф и гадкие охотники ,ну и зачетная концовка,но увы ВАУ эффекта уже нет :(
Рано или поздно все приедается,поэтому серии нужна хорошая встряска.

Вентили сами все знали про результат,поэтому и придумали развод с "оранж боксом" мол не выпендривайтесь,вот вам в нагрузку еще игры,тока купите плиииз.
Блин я не фанат игры,но мне уже интересно,как вентили будут реабилитироваться.Старые фанаты уже выросли и половина забила на игры,другая половина забила на Half-Life,остались тока малочисленные "тру пэтриотс" которые писают кипятком при каждом слухе о продолжении.
Перед Valve стоит неимоверная задача,отмахнуться от говна старых фанатов и завлеч новых игроков! 
Это как минимум должна быть революция во всем!
Правильно,что дали перекур,кто его знает,что они там запилят в итоге (жаль будет если еще одна серия под конец протухнет,в последние годы это сплошь и рядом происходит)

Этот эпизод выводит серию мира Half-Life на новый уровень! В этой части еще больше диалогов и ролевых моментов. Перед нами разыгрывается очень драматическая история, вы обязательно испытаете много эмоций играя в эту часть. Ну и конечно захватывающий экшн и динамика присутствуют. Must have! Однозначно!
Went through limbo with a chopper chasing me while trying to keep the gnome in a car. 11/10 would nuke that gnome again.

Again, this continues Half-Life 2, which is good, but nothing has really changed here from Episode 1, or even the original released in 2004.

It's amazing nevertheless, just, we have to wait again for Episode 3, which is annoying.
Amazing! Bring out the next story!

A klasszikus HL2 második kiegészítője, amely ott kezdődik ahol az Episode One abbamaradt. Ezúttal egy kis erdei túrára és kocsikázásra invitál a játék. Megismerhetjük a Hunter-eket akiknek Gordon néhányszor odacsap a feszítővassal. Harcban nincs hiány mivel a Combine-ok állandóan megpróbálják megzavarni a hegyvidéki kirándulásunkat.

Összeségében nagyon jó kiegészítő.
As Valve gets dangerously close to releasing a game with a '3' in the title, Lance Corporal Graham Frogbat returns to the forest of doom, and this time he's got a jalopy.
Quero mais!!Onde está o Episode 3?! :o

Another expansion of Half-Life story and so far..this is my favourite. Much better than episode one and there were moments that I've enjoyed more than sometimes in original HL2. Definitively worth buying for all gamers interested in HL story.

Everyone owes it to themselves to play through the entire Half-Life 2 saga.

It's just that good. Sure, some sequences (DRIVING) will have you frustrated, but this game ages incredibly well, and has some of the finest area design, music, writing, and scripting. Ever.

More Half-Life!  Episode 2 is definitely better than episode 1, but just as short.  This episode gets back on track where episode 1 went off, though still not as good as Half-Life 2.  I think that inability to make these episodes as good as Half-Life 2 is really what drove Valve to abandon the episodic format and focus on a full-sized sequel (however long that takes.)

This episode did bring along graphical improvements as well, being released in the Orange Box with the new Source 2007 engine.  While Half-Life 2 and Episode One have been updated to the new engine since release, they still aren't up to the same graphical quality as this episode.

Like episode 1, it's definitely worth playing but you probably won't have any urge to replay it in the future.
A must have
Much better than Episode One: longer, more difficult and more exciting. A must have for all HL fans. Waiting for Ep 3, or...HL3 :)

A série [h1]Half Life[/h1] contempla o real interesse de um estúdio/empresa em desenvolver algo digno de se tornar [b]Atemporal[/b], que através de uma obra consegue mostrar que uma equipe muito diferenciada se atentou a fazer o melhor possível para que a satisfação ao jogar fosse o mais entusiasmante possível, ao ponto das pessoas clamarem por um final ou mais sequencias de sua história (bem escrita), mesmo após anos.  [h1] Muito bom!!![/h1].

Who's the dude with the goaty and glasses?...Continuing the saga of the enigmatic Dr. Gordon Freeman and his cohorts the good Dr. must face new enemies over lush landscapes and endure breath taking action set-pieces. As with all Half Life games, story expostion is carried out in-game ensuring maximum emersion. Make sure to check out the other Half-Life games in the series as they're all crucial.

（HL2シリーズはFPSとして見るより、
　アドベンチャー寄りのアクションと見たほうが納得できると思うよ！）

舞台はCity 17脱出直後、
目的はあれの父親の元に、アレを無事に送り届け、“ある使命”を果たす事。

今回は思考と行動が同時に要求されるような戦闘が中心で、
しかも面白い乗り物が登場する。

果たしてあなたはこの衝撃の結末を直視できるのか？試してみるといい、何事も経験だ。
Buy it! Play it! Love it! Play the whole Half life story, way to awesome<3
The most beautiful Half-Life game, intense emotionally and full of heavy combat. At this point most of the characters are so dear to you that their destinies will touch you deeply.

это самая классная и интересная из всех халф лайф тут нет однаобразия как в первом эпизоде ,она не надоедает как халф лайв 2 и здесь на столько пропитаный сюжет который заканчиваеться трагично я не мог оторваться блин даже проходить жалко было (жду третий эпизод) VALVE рулит gordon freeman forever

Amazing that there is an episode 2. This further expands on some experimentation with mechanics, for what the HL series exist. But this one drives the store and introduces new mysteries and questions. The atmosphere in this episode is through the roof.

As if this game needs an introduction or a recommednation. However, in my experience this is the "tightest" of all the HL2 products, especially in terms of story, gameplay variety, and sheer focus.  You've done most of these things before, but Valve manages to mix it up so that the game NEVER gets stale.

All combine to present a product that is tightly hone and constantly pushing the player forward. I cannot stress enough, play this game.
Half-life 2 episode 2 is just plain epic!
